comments.comment: It would be awesome if the 300 can have an led RGB cob strip around the unit with Bluetooth app control of the colour. This could be versatile as a night light for kids sleeping when camping. In red or white.
You can buy a rgb Bluetooth controller and strip off Amazon for $15 so it wouldn't be an expensive addition.
Hello Tristan,
We appreciate your suggestions! We are taking all feedback into consideration for our product development.
Would be better if the 122 had 2x usb c ports and 2x usb A ports.
Hi Tristan,

We appreciate your input on adding more USB ports to the 122. We understand the convenience of having multiple USB-C and USB-A ports, and it's definitely something we’ll consider as we continue to improve the design for future versions.
At the moment, we’ll take your feedback into account as we plan updates.
Thanks again for helping us make the product even better!
Would be great to design the 300 so the carry handle was more discreet. Or retractable. The large handle is too big and ruins the aesthetics.
Hi Tristan,

Thank you for your feedback! We appreciate your input on the design of the carry handle. We understand that the size of the handle might not be to everyone's taste, and we’re always striving to improve both the function and aesthetics of our products.
We’ll definitely consider your suggestion for a more discreet or retractable handle as we move forward with product development.
Thanks again for sharing your thoughts!
Hi, about neo 122, can i charge a phone while the power bank is charging?
Dimensions and weight of it, please
Do you have option for UK or China plug in?
Hello Ana,
The dimensions are as follows:
L: 5.8 in
W: 1.5 in
Weight: 640 g
Neo 122 supports pass-through charging, at a speed of 22.5W through the USB-A port. The USB-C port cannot be used for pass-through charging because it doubles as a charging port for the power bank.

For non-US backers, we will have wall adapters available on request. You will receive a survey after the campaign is over that will let you select your region and your appropriate adapter. We will be releasing more information on this in an upcoming update this week.
